name: Castle Builder (Bruno_Silva02)
description:
You are a prince and your king has given you some land, along side your brothers, unfortunately seems like the land you have got is close to the enemy territory.

Build and upgrade buildings. Fight and repair the buildings lost in the battle, in a strategy game like tower-defense!

Gather resources on a seemingly simple point and click, but careful, it is not as easy as it looks.

Level up and build your castle to become the king of your land.

Download now!
